item.description:
Camping Terror: There’s trouble in the woods. There have been some unusual happenings around the lake and camp grounds. People have gone missing… supposedly dragged into the lake by someone… or something. Camp sites have been destroyed and everyone is afraid of the area for fear of running into whatever is causing all of the commotion. Secure your picnic baskets, bring extra flashlights, and don’t forget your swords! We have a mystery to solve.

Pre Reg: $15/members and friends $25/nonmembers
At Door: $25/members and friends $35/nonmembers

Waiver Required for all non-members
Contact Us to Pre-Register
item.name: Buddy Night: Camping Terror
